page.title: 02Mikaler's Diary April 16th
page.content: This morning I woke up at 8.15am.I put on my{cotton socks, knickers,jeans}and {sweatshirt.}I went downstairs to get breakfast.The grill was on so I got my mums and brothers breakfasts and switched on the kettle.{I dont have {breakfast}so I watched a bit of{"Good {Morning Britain"}on{ITV.}When my brother had finished I washed the pots then I washed,and brushed my teeth.At 8.40am I walked to Lisa's house and we walked to school.When I got there,I did my morning job of putting the{hymn {numbers up for assembly.}Afterwards I started the Domesday Project writing. At 12.00 noon I had dinner in the {school cafeteria.}I had{Pizza, mashed {potatoes}and{beans}followed by{cake and a{drink of water.}After dinner I played with the girls ball on the playground. Later we sorted the maps out and did quiet reading.
